extra.options: [{ label: '1 to many', value: '1:m'}, { label: 'many to 1', value: 'm:1'}, { label: '1 to 1', value: '1:1'}, { label: 'many to many', value: 'm:m'}]

extra.onChange: (values) => { if (values.relationshipType === 'm:1') { aptugo.tableUtils.findContainerTable(values.reference).fields.push({ data_type: 'Relationship', column_name: `Rel: ${values.column_name}`, unique_id: aptugo.generateID(), reference: values.unique_id }) } }

extra.options: [{ label: 'Standard Key', value: '_id' }, ...aptugo.tableUtils.getAllFields().map(field => { return { label: field[1], value: field[0] } })]
